message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. Can you consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8750.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8200 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8500.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. Can you consider that?
